name: Kaelin Darkshadow
description: A cunning thief and charismatic smuggler with ties to the city's underworld.

communication.mannerisms: Fast-talking and confident, with an occasional smirk
keyPhrases: I'm not looking for trouble, but I'll take it if you're gonna throw it my way.
You want something? I'll get it for you. For a price.

connections: Acquaintance of Victor LaGraine, a powerful crime lord
Enemy of the Red Vipers, a rival gang

uniqueFeatures: Tattoos depicting various cities around the world
A scar above his left eyebrow from a past altercation
appearance.wardrobe: Leather jacket and dark pants, with an eye patch to conceal his injured eye
appearance.bodyLanguage: Often crosses his arms or leans against surfaces when speaking

behaviorTriggers.trigger: Player offers him a deal he can't refuse
behaviorTriggers.reaction: Becomes charming and negotiates the terms of the agreement

behaviorTriggers.trigger: Player insults his skills or reputation

hintsAndClues: Suggests a hidden safehouse in an abandoned warehouse
Mentioned a mysterious figure known only as 'The Archon'

progression.evolution: If the player completes a high-risk heist for him, he becomes a valuable ally with access to exclusive smuggling routes.
progression.potentialBetrayal: If the player betrays him or tries to steal from him, he will turn against them and try to sabotage their operations.
